name: XMission
tag_list: broadband, internet, connectivity, voip, hosted-pbx, hosting, email-hosting, networking, colocation
overview:
XMission provides cloud hosting, colocation, broadband Internet connectivity, email hosting, and digital phone services to progressive small businesses.

Headquartered in Salt Lake City, XMission is one of the oldest and most experienced Internet service companies in the United States. They deliver their complete set of flexible, scalable, integrated Internet services over a well-tuned, diverse-carrier network.

XMission is powered 100% by green energy and proudly supports community activities and nonprofit organizations across Utah. They also have a strong commitment to open source.

Detailed descriptions of XMission’s services are available online at www.xmission.com. XMission can be reached by email at sales@xmission.com or by phone at 877.964.7746.
